item.title: Building a Dell T420 with ESXi 5
item.author: dave@petzel.email (David Petzel)
item.description: I recently got the opportunity to play with a new Dell T420, and I decided I would run ESXi 5 on it. Background My day job does not really allow me much hands on access to hardware any more so its been a while since I’ve gotten to build a new server, but I recently got the chance to work on this as a side project. The server came pre-installed with Windows 2012 Standard.
